Package com.example.bobstomatoes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IngredientStorageFragment.OnIngredientFragmentListener
    Interface containing methods to be called on various dialog conclusions (add button pressed, etc)
    MealPlanFragment.OnMealPlanFragmentListener
    Interface to be implemented by classes using fragment
    MealPlanScaleFragment.OnMealPlanScaleFragmentListener  
    RecipeFragment.OnRecipeFragmentListener
    Interface implemented by classes using fragment Contains methods for handling various fragment conclusions
    RecyclerViewInterface
    Interface for custom recyclerviews
    ShoppingListFragment.OnShoppingListFragmentListener
    Interface for classes using this fragment Contains method to run when dialog ends by ADD button
    ShoppingListItemClickInterface
    Shopping List Interface creates checkboxes
    SpecifyIngredientAmountFragment.OnRecipeIngredientListener
    Interface for the onAddIngredientOkPressed
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNavigationBar
    Abstract class specifying logic for navigation bar buttons at bottom of app extends AppCompatActivity
    Ingredient
    Class detailing the information of an ingredient Implements Parcelable
    IngredientDB
    Class adding, removing, and editing ingredient firebase database
    IngredientStorageActivity
    Class for Ingredient Storage which displays a list of all ingredients extends AbstractNavigator implements IngredientStorageFragment.OnIngredientFragmentListener
    IngredientStorageActivityTest
    Test class for IngredientStorageActivity.
    IngredientStorageAdapter
    Custom array adapter class designed to work with ingredient objects
    IngredientStorageFragment
    Class for the Ingredient Storage Fragment which allows the user to add, edit, and delete ingredients extends DialogFragment
    IngredientStorageMealPlanAdapter
    Custom array adapter class designed to work with ingredient objects Intended for use within meal plan activity
    IngredientStorageRecyclerAdapter
    Custom recycler adapter class used in IngredientStorageActivity
    IngredientTest
    Ingredient test, test sorting of ingredients by description, date, location, category, test will execute on android device
    MealPlan
    Class detailing the information of a meal plan implements Parcelable
    MealPlanActivity
    Class for Meal Plan which displays a calendar showing meal plans extends AbstractNavigator
    MealPlanActivityTest
    Test class for MealPlanActivity.
    MealPlanDB
    Class adding, removing, and editing meal plans in firebase database
    MealPlanFragment  
    MealPlanScaleFragment
    Class for the Meal Plan Scale Fragment which allows the user to adjust the number of servings for the meal plan extends DialogFragment
    Recipe
    Class detailing the information of a Recipe implements Parcelable
    RecipeActivity
    Class for Recipe which displays a list of all the recipes extends AbstractNavigationBar implements RecipeFragment.OnRecipeFragmentListener
    RecipeActivityTest
    Test class for RecipeActivity.
    RecipeAdapter
    Custom array adapter class designed to work with recipe objects
    RecipeDB
    Class adding, removing, and editing recipe firebase database
    RecipeFragment
    DialogFragment for adding, editing, and deleting a recipe extends DialogFragment
    RecipeRecyclerAdapter
    Custom recycler adapter intended for use with RecipeActivity
    RecipeTest
    Recipe test, test sorting of recipes by title, time, servings, category, test will execute on an android device
    ShoppingList
    Class detailing the information of a ShoppingList implements Parcelable
    ShoppingListActivity
    ShoppingListActivity, displays shoppingList and extends AbstractNavigationBar
    ShoppingListActivityTest
    Test class for ShoppingListActivity.
    ShoppingListFragment
    Class for the Shopping List Fragment which allows the user to edit ingredients extends DialogFragment
    ShoppingListRecyclerAdapter
    Recycler adapter for shopping list
    ShoppingListTest
    ShoppingList test, test sorting of ingredients in shopping list by description, category, test will execute on android device
    SpecifyIngredientAmountFragment
    Fragment for inputting ingredient amount to add
